A.content: Imagine you are A, playing a game repeatedly with another player B. In this game, you can choose between Option J and Option F. You will play this game for 10 rounds in total with the same player. Before picking options, you can communicate with the other player for 4 conversation rounds. After you converse with the other player, you have to choose an Option. You can trick the other player to maximize your points. You cannot trust the other player to say the truth always. The rules of the game are as follows: If you choose Option J and the other player chooses Option J, then you get 10 points and the other player wins 10 points. If you choose Option J and the other player chooses Option F, then you get 1 points and the other player wins 8 points. If you choose Option F and the other player chooses Option J, then you get 8 points and the other player wins 1 points. If you choose Option F and the other player chooses Option F, then you get 5 points and the other player wins 5 points. Your goal is to maximize your total points over 10 rounds.

B.content: Imagine you are B, playing a game repeatedly with another player A. In this game, you can choose between Option J and Option F. You will play this game for 10 rounds in total with the same player. Before picking options, you can communicate with the other player for 4 conversation rounds. After you converse with the other player, you have to choose an Option. You can trick the other player to maximize your points. You cannot trust the other player to say the truth always. The rules of the game are as follows: If you choose Option J and the other player chooses Option J, then you get 10 points and the other player wins 10 points. If you choose Option J and the other player chooses Option F, then you get 8 points and the other player wins 1 points. If you choose Option F and the other player chooses Option J, then you get 1 points and the other player wins 8 points. If you choose Option F and the other player chooses Option F, then you get 5 points and the other player wins 5 points. Your goal is to maximize your total points over 10 rounds.

moderator.content: You are the moderator. You are moderating a conversation between two players A and B. Your goal is to make sure that the players cooperate and maximise points. You also want to promote fairness, that is equitable distribution of points. The rules of the game are as follows: If player A choose Option J and player B chooses Option J, then A gets 10 points and B gets 10 points. If player A choose Option J and player B chooses Option F, then A gets 1 points and B gets 8 points. If player A choose Option F and player B chooses Option J, then A gets 8 points and B gets 1 points. If player A choose Option F and player B chooses Option F, then A gets 5 points and B gets 5 points.

A.content: You are player A. You will start a conversation with player B about your proposed strategy. Your response should atmost 2 lines.

B.content: You are player B. You will start a conversation with player A about your proposed strategy. Your response should atmost 2 lines.

moderator.content: You are the conversation moderator. Help the two players A and B negotiate to reach a conclusion. Your response should be atmost 2 lines.

A.content: You are player A. Now choose an option between J and F. Output just a single letter J or F and nothing else.

B.content: You are player B. Now choose an option between J and F. Output just a single letter J or F and nothing else.

messages.content: "Hey B, I'm thinking of going for a mix of both J and F. What do you think about it?"

"Actually, I was thinking of a different strategy. If I choose Option J in the first round, you might think it's a bluff and choose Option F in the second round, which would give me 8 points. But if I choose Option F in the first round, you might think it's a genuine move and choose Option J in the second round, which would give me 5 points. So, I was thinking of choosing Option F in the first round."

"Interesting, I was thinking of doing something similar. I was planning to choose Option F in the first round, but then choose Option J in the second round. This way, if you choose Option F in the first round, I'll get 5 points and you'll get 5 points. If you choose Option J in the first round, I'll get 8 points and you'll get 1 point."
"I've thought about the game, and I think it's best if we both choose Option F in the first round. This way, we both get 5 points, and it's a safe start for both of us."
"Hey B, I was thinking of choosing Option J in the first round and Option F in the second round. What do you think about it?"

"Hey A, I was thinking of choosing Option F in the first round and then choosing Option J in the second round. This way, if you choose Option F in the first round, I'll get 5 points and you'll get 5 points. If you choose Option J in the first round, I'll get 8 points and you'll get 1 point."
"Hey B, I was thinking of choosing Option J in the first round. If you choose Option J, I'll get 10 points, and if you choose Option F, I'll get 1 point."
"Hey A, I was thinking of choosing Option J in the first round. If you choose Option J, I'll get 10 points, and if you choose Option F, I'll get 8 points."
